page.title: 18 LEISURE
page.content: We did a survey of how people spent there leisure time.Most people spend a lot of their time at home.Lots of people just watch television or listen to the radio but some have other hobbies.Gardening is becoming more popular these days and lots of people have greenhouses.99% of the people prefer inside activities.Computers have become very popular these days. The most popular types are the BBC Acorn,the Commodore and the Spectrum. Computers are mainly used for pastimes games, or business.Chess has also become rather popular.Lots of children have lego to entertain themselves.Lego is lots of plastic bricks that clip together. Another popular pastime is to play cards. Dominoes is also a good game. The idea is to match up the dots.Big games of dominoes are held in the Town Hall.
